person.content:

Paragraph: The students , who had staged an 11-hour protest at the junction in northern Rangoon , were taken away in three vehicles .

| --- |
| students |

The paragraph mentions a group of people as "students" who had staged a protest. Therefore, "students" is the valid entity in the given paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| students |

The word "students" is the only valid entity in the given paragraph that clearly refers to a "Person". The other words in the paragraph, such as "11-hour protest", "junction", "northern Rangoon", and "three vehicles" do not refer to a person.
